name: Ace of Pentacles
description: A hand, issuing from a cloud, holds up a pentacle.

name: Two of Pentacles
description: A young man dances holding a pentacle in each hand, connected by an endless cord.

name: Three of Pentacles
description: A sculptor at work in a monastery, representing skill and diligence.

name: Four of Pentacles
description: A crowned figure clutches a pentacle, holding onto possessions tightly.

name: Five of Pentacles
description: Two mendicants pass a lighted window in a snowstorm, suggesting hardship.

name: Six of Pentacles
description: A merchant weighs money and distributes it to the needy, symbolizing generosity.

name: Seven of Pentacles
description: A young man leans on his staff, surveying seven pentacles, representing reflection.

name: Eight of Pentacles
description: An artist works on stone carvings, representing skill and diligence.

name: Nine of Pentacles
description: A woman stands in a garden with a bird on her wrist, surrounded by abundance.

name: Ten of Pentacles
description: A family under an archway with a child and elder, representing legacy and wealth.

name: Page of Pentacles
description: A youthful figure examines a floating pentacle, representing study and application.

name: Knight of Pentacles
description: Rides a slow, enduring horse, symbolizing responsibility and reliability.

name: Queen of Pentacles
description: A woman contemplates her pentacle, embodying generosity, security, and intelligence.

name: King of Pentacles
description: A mature figure seated with symbols of power and wealth, representing mastery in material affairs.

name: Ace of Pentacles Reversed
description: A hand holds a pentacle upside down, indicating challenges in material matters.

name: Two of Pentacles Reversed
description: A young man dances with pentacles but loses balance, showing stress and chaos.

name: Three of Pentacles Reversed
description: A sculptor at work reflects mediocrity or lack of skill.

name: Four of Pentacles Reversed
description: A figure releases pentacles, indicating suspense or delay.

name: Five of Pentacles Reversed
description: Mendicants in a snowstorm signify disorder reversed.

name: Six of Pentacles Reversed
description: A merchant weighs money unfairly, symbolizing desire, envy, and illusion.

name: Seven of Pentacles Reversed
description: A young man looks at pentacles with anxiety, reflecting financial worry.

name: Eight of Pentacles Reversed
description: The artist works with vanity and ambition thwarted.

name: Nine of Pentacles Reversed
description: A woman in abundance faces deception and failed projects.

name: Ten of Pentacles Reversed
description: A family under an archway experiences chance, loss, or theft.

name: Page of Pentacles Reversed
description: A youthful figure misapplies learning, reflecting prodigality and dissipation.

name: Knight of Pentacles Reversed
description: A slow horseman reflects inertia, idleness, and stagnation.

name: Queen of Pentacles Reversed
description: A queen's qualities are corrupted or mistrusted.

name: King of Pentacles Reversed
description: A king's power in material matters reflects vice and corruption.
